Comment.value:
How to Use: During race selection select your base race, then click the subrace box and type in EXACTLY the name as it is in the syntax prompt below.

Subraces - Human


Aasimar

Syntax: Aasimar

Stats: 
+2 Wisdom, +4 Charisma

Feats: 
Resist Energy: Electrical, Resist Energy: Cold, Resist Energy: Sonic, Improved Initiative

Skills: 
+5 Spellcraft, +5 Persuasion

Spells per day: 
Light 3x/day, Ethereal Visage 2x/day, Improved Invisibility 1x/day



Lizardfolk

Syntax: Lizardfolk

Stats: 
+2 Strength, +4 Constitution, -2 Charisma

Immunities: 
10% Fire, 10% Acid

Vulnerabilities: 
5% Electrical

Feats: 
Dodge, Mobility

Special Ability: 
Lizard Regeneration: Once per day, the Lizardfolk can cast a special Monstrous Regeneration gaining +5 regeneration for every 10 character levels, to a total of 30 Regeneration, for five minutes. While this is active, however the Lizardfolk's vulnerabilities become 10% Cold Vulnerability and 10% Electrical vulnerability.



Tiefling

Syntax: Tiefling

Stats: 
+2 Dexterity, +2 Intelligence

Feats: 
Resist Energy: Electrical, Resist Energy: Fire, Resist Energy: Acid, Weapon Focus: Rapier

Skills: 
+5 Spot, +5 Intimidate

Spells per day: 
Darkness: 3x per day, Etheral Visage: 2x per day, Improved Invisibility: 1x per day



Werewolf

Syntax: Werewolf

Stats: 
+2 Strength, +2 Constitution, -2 Intelligence, +2 Wisdom

Feats: 
Weapon Specialization: Unarmed Strike, Epic Weapon Specialization: Unarmed Strike

Special Ability: 
Full Moon: Once per day, the Werewolf can turn INTO a werewolf gaining +2 ab, +6 damage, an extra attack, -4AC, 10% slash immune, 10% vulnerability to positive and divine.

How to Use: During race selection select your base race, then click the subrace box and type in EXACTLY the name as it is in the syntax prompt below.

Subraces - Human


Aasimar

Syntax: Aasimar

Stats: 
+2 Wisdom, +4 Charisma

Feats: 
Resist Energy: Electrical, Resist Energy: Cold, Resist Energy: Sonic, Improved Initiative

Skills: 
+5 Spellcraft, +5 Persuasion

Spells per day: 
Light 3x/day, Ethereal Visage 2x/day, Improved Invisibility 1x/day



Lizardfolk

Syntax: Lizardfolk

Stats: 
+2 Strength, +4 Constitution, -2 Charisma

Immunities: 
10% Fire, 10% Acid

Vulnerabilities: 
5% Electrical

Feats: 
Dodge, Mobility

Special Ability: 
Lizard Regeneration: Once per day, the Lizardfolk can cast a special Monstrous Regeneration gaining +5 regeneration for every 10 character levels, to a total of 30 Regeneration, for five minutes. While this is active, however the Lizardfolk's vulnerabilities become 10% Cold Vulnerability and 10% Electrical vulnerability.



Tiefling

Syntax: Tiefling

Stats: 
+2 Dexterity, +2 Intelligence

Feats: 
Resist Energy: Electrical, Resist Energy: Fire, Resist Energy: Acid, Weapon Focus: Rapier

Skills: 
+5 Spot, +5 Intimidate

Spells per day: 
Darkness: 3x per day, Etheral Visage: 2x per day, Improved Invisibility: 1x per day



Werewolf

Syntax: Werewolf

Stats: 
+2 Strength, +2 Constitution, -2 Intelligence, +2 Wisdom

Feats: 
Weapon Specialization: Unarmed Strike, Epic Weapon Specialization: Unarmed Strike

Special Ability: 
Full Moon: Once per day, the Werewolf can turn INTO a werewolf gaining +2 ab, +6 damage, an extra attack, -4AC, 10% slash immune, 10% vulnerability to positive and divine.
